document.full_text: mortgage finance giant fannie mae  on friday said it would ask for an additional $8.5 billion from taxpayers as it continues to suffer losses on loans made prior to 2009.
document.title: fannie mae seeks $8.5 billion from taxpayers
lines_and_colors: mortgage finance giant fannie mae  on friday said it would ask for an additional $8.5 billion from taxpayers as it continues to suffer losses on loans made prior to 2009.
